content: If you were Gollum from Lord of the Rings, how would you convince someone to give you a piece of cake?

We needs it, precious. We deserves a piece of cake, yes we does. Look at us, so hungry, so tired. Give us cake, pretty please? We'll be good, promise. Just a small piece, that's all we asks for. You won't even miss it, honest. And we'll sing you a song, yes, a lovely song about the mountains and the sea. So pretty, so melodic. Just give us the cake, and we'll perform for you, yes, yes, yes.
